document.full_text: a north texas deputy has died after being shot in the line of duty in a small town south of dallas-fort worth and a suspect also was fatally shot, authorities said.
document.title: deputy is killed in texas, and suspect is shot dead
lines_and_colors: a north texas deputy has died after being shot in the line of duty in a small town south of dallas-fort worth and a suspect also was fatally shot, authorities said.
